question: In which nation "Poas Volcano" is located?
explanation: Poas Volcano is a stratovolcano located in the Cordillera Central parent mountain range of Costa Rica. It is 2708 metes above sea level. It houses Poas Volcano National Park. The last eruption happened in April 2017. It has two crater lakes, one is, Laguna Caliente which is one of the world's most acidic lakes and second is, Lake Botos which is inactive and always surrounded by cloud forest.
